title: Oil Pastel
desc1: These intimate 4" x 6" oil pastel pieces are created with rich, textured strokes that bring each scene to life in a warm, expressive way. Each drawing captures a moment, a memory, or a place with soft blends, vibrant colors, and the unique depth that only oil pastels can give.
desc2: These drawings are not available for online purchase at the moment. They are exclusively sold in person at my art events. To know where Iâ€™ll be next, make sure to follow me on Instagram @lifeofquoi.
